Eqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq tAvEqvAsmai$ praqjAM pra sA#dhayatO viqndatE$ praqjA-mai$ndrAqgna-mEkA#daSakapAlaqM nirva#pEqth sparddha#mAnaqH kShEtrE# vA sajAqtEShu# vEndrAqgnI Eqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq tAByA#mEqvEndriqyaM 
~MvIqrya#M BrAtRu#vyasya vRu~gktEq vi pAqpmanAq BrAtRu#vyENa jayaqtE&paq vA EqtasmA#dindriqyaM ~MvIqrya#M krAmatiq yaH sa#grAMqma-mu#papraqyAtyai$ndrAqgna-mEkA#daSakapAlaqM ni - [  ]  2
